fields.name: Capacity
fields.description: The size of the Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: for C (Basic/Standard) family (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), for P (Premium) family (1, 2, 3, 4).

fields.name: Family
fields.description: The SKU family to use. Valid values: (C, P). (C = Basic/Standard, P = Premium).

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The type of Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: (Basic, Standard, Premium)
